item.title: The Development of Smiles, Part 0
item.description: I know my track record for completing a blog series is pretty lousy, but this one should be easier. I kept a personal log with pictures during the development of Smiles, so most of the work is done for me. I just need need to go through it and regurgitate my notes. To start, Iâ€™m going to give a bit of insight in to what happened when I stopped writing my Engines, Names and Evolution blog series last year.
